properties.title: Flower Clock
properties.abstract: Watchmaking in Geneva. A symbol of the world-famous Geneva watch industry, the well known flower clock, located at the edge of the Jardin Anglais (English Garden) since 1955, is a masterpiece of technology and floral art.
properties.description:
Formerly only decorative with its sole dial composed of over 12,000 flowers; the new millennium provided it with decisive artistic dimensions thanks to the talent of the gardeners of the Service of Green Spaces and Environment.

As the seasons change, so do the shape, color and plant types of the clock, creating a colorful carpet.

The second hand of Geneva's Flower Clock is the largest in the world with its 2.5 meters!
properties.name: Fondation Genève Tourisme & Congrès
